name: Ethernet_Manager
description: Simple Ethernet Manager for Teensy, SAM DUE, SAMD21, SAMD51, nRF52, ESP32, ESP8266, etc. boards, with or without SSL, configuration data saved in ESP8266 LittleFS, SPIFFS, nRF52 LittleFS/InternalFS, EEPROM, DueFlashStorage or SAMD FlashStorage.
keywords: communication, ethernet, data, esp8266, http, W5500, W5x00, ENC28J60, Teensy, SAM DUE, SAMD21, SAMD51, STM32, nRF52, Credentials, Manager, Config Portal, Double, Reset, Detector
